alert.note: Alert for Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Winston County through 730 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Millcreek, or near Louisville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Betheden around 705 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
